meanings.definition: Hypermedia: a multimedia system in which related items of information are connected and can be presented together.
meanings.sent1: The hypermedia on the website allowed users to easily navigate between different types of content.
meanings.sent2: I accessed the hypermedia on the platform to watch videos, view images, and read articles all in one place.
meanings.sent3: The hypermedia decided to throw a party and invited all the information to join in the fun.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a hypermedia, connecting memories, thoughts, and emotions in a complex web.
meanings.sent5: The hypermedia was like a digital spider weaving a web of interconnected information for users to explore.
